name: Run Walrus Run
description:
Run Walrus Run is a grid based puzzle game where every few steps Mr. Walrus sends out a destructive wave, affecting the environment in various ways. Help Mr. Walrus navigate his way through his first day at a new office and try not to cause to much destruction.

Creators

  • Stephen Davey, Lead Programmer
  • Loughlin Connolly, Project Manager
  • Connor Stobbie, Artist and Character Modeller
